A discovery of some plots of Lucifer and his council against the children of men. N. D.
[2], 111, [5] p.
Printed for T. Brewster at the sign of the three Bibles at the West end of Pauls., London, : 1656.
Signed at end: N.D. With 2 final leaves of advertisement. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 3". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
